directions.step: Place 1/2 cup coarsely chopped fresh basil leaves and 2 cloves split peeled garlic in a sterilized pint jar. Heat wine or distilled WHITE vinegar to just below the boiling point. Fill jar with vinegar, and cap tightly. Allow to stand 3 to 4 weeks. Strain vinegar, discarding basil and garlic. Pour vinegar into a clean sterilized jar, adding a new sprig of fresh basil, if desired. Seal tightly. Use in dressings for rice, pasta, antipasto salads or in flavored mayonnaise.
